*p*"Form of Contract for Introducing *person_mentioned*Servants */person_mentioned*into the *location_mentioned*State of Coahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned* "*/p*
*p*[Prepared by Austin for the use of immigrants who wished to evade the laws excluding slavery. The substance of the document is quoted by Lester G. Bugbee in Political Science Quarterly, XIII. For the circumstances of the passage of the law legalizing such
evasion, see Musquiz to Austin, April 17, 1828, and Navarro and Arciniega to Austin, May 17, 1828.]*/p*
